name: Sorry But We Have Only Explosives (7 days made)
name_original: Sorry But We Have Only Explosives (7 days made)
description:
You are a special agent. A special agent in a alien attack. You need to beat all the monsters up. So your boss said that there are no guns because they got none of them... only EXPLOSIVES ... lets see how it goes...

I made this game in one week so it has very big amount of bugs. It is my first publication so I care what you think about my game. Write the comments about it.
